message.raw:
Update Image Save

Changed the way that images are saved based on the
suggestion from DM. Testing indicates that this
method to convert from FLIR's image format to a
numpy array reduces saving time by 10-50% per
image (variation in improvement is probably due to
variation in saving time before improvement).

DSB
